definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: What is the uP data and address bus width?
sentences.chinese: 微處理器的數據總線和地址總線的帶寬分別爲多少？

sentences.english: High speed data bus technology is one of the core techniques in avionics.
sentences.chinese: 高速數據總線技術是航空電子中的關鍵技術之一。
